nodes.text: The Juvex sector was a sector in the galaxy, located near the Senex sector within the Mid Rim region of the galaxy. Put together, these sectors made up the galactic region known as the Senex-Juvex. In the years prior to the Battle of Naboo, Q'anah's Marauders, a pirate group led by the pirate queen Q'anah, was famous for its bold crusades across the Senex-Juvex.
